Articles.Content:
I've found that time warp within 1km of a station results in the space station exploding.

1. Anyone else getting this?

2. is this new?

Moved, provisionally, to Support (unmodded installs).

I can't say I've seen this issue. Since you can reproduce it reliably, please provide a quicksave and/or your output\_log.txt/Player.log.
Hi rhylbom, please see the support stickies and provide your game logs, no one else seems to be getting this ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'm getting it. I'll make a new thread since I have a mod.

Yep, there is definitely something going on with warp above 1k. At my moon base, every time I accidentally warp past 1k, one of my local ships explodes. It isn't mods causing it and it isn't part clipping. I checked both. There are also various other problems associated with going past warp 1k, such as bugged mining equipment and temps can sometimes get set to NaN for every part of the vessel which requires a save edit to fix.
